findings.title: Improper Setting of Asset Details
findings.description: The DAO can transfer out the fund after the project owner has funded the token. Moreover, when the token address has been changed, the users cannot claim the token after the vesting has started.

findings.title: Improper DAO Privilege in Emergency Withdrawal Process
findings.description: The DAO can transfer the token to any arbitrary address, stealing the token from the platform owner due to improper privilege management.

findings.title: Modification of Vesting Information After Finalization
findings.description: The configurator role can change the vesting information after the group state has been finalized to benefit more from the vesting.

findings.title: Starting of Vesting Without Funded Group
findings.description: The startVesting function does not check if at least one group is funded before starting vesting, leading to business logic errors.
